title: From the Ashes
description: Necromancer Bastion is being hunted by a phoenix assassin when an unprecedented cataclysm causes his Earth of winged elementals and magic to meld with an alternate reality of humans and technology. When he arrives at what will come to be known as the City of Souls, only his unique power can save the city from collapsing in the chaos.‘From the Ashes’ is a prequel short story to Mel Harding-Shaw's Melded Earths world. It is set 25 years before the Soul Court Ascension urban fantasy series and tells the story of the Melding and how Bastion meets Ra. It features benevolent necromancy, found family, and an apocalyptic Wellington, Aotearoa New Zealand.
author: Mel Harding-Shaw
